article.headline: Robert Morris 73, Cent. Michigan 60
article.story: AUBURN HILLS, Mich. -- Jeremy Chappell had 20 points and 10 rebounds Saturday to lead Robert Morris to a 73-60 victory over Central Michigan Saturday at the Palace of Auburn Hills. Chappell missed last season's loss to the Chippewas because of an academic suspension, but his double-double helped Robert Morris (6-5) post its first win after three straight losses to Central Michigan. Marcus Van led the Chippewas (3-7) with 21 points. The Colonials led 41-33 at the half, outshooting Central Michigan 72 percent-46 percent. Only Van's 12 first-half points kept the Chippewas in the game. The game was the first half of a doubleheader with Oakland-Michigan as the nightcap.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
